anya-e1202n0:16: Vattabbameva ca bahumpi yato na vuttaṁ
anya-e1202n0:19: Vuccamānaṁ mayā sādhu vaṁsaṁ thūpassa satthunoti;
anya-e1202n0:20_0: Tattha thūpassa vaṁsaṁ vakkhāmīti ettha tathāgato arahaṁ sammā sambuddho thūpāraho,
anya-e1202n0:20_1: paccekabuddho thūpāraho, tathāgatassa sāvako thūpāraho, rājā cakkavatti thūpārahoti
anya-e1202n0:20_2: vacanato thūpārahānaṁ buddhādīnaṁ dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā kata cetiyaṁ abbhunana taṭṭhena
anya-e1202n0:20_3: thūpoti vuccati, idha pana kañcana mālika mahāthūpo adhippeto, so kassa dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:20_4: katoti ce? Yodīpaṅkarādīnaṁ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṁ santike laddhavyākaraṇo samatiṁsapāramiyo
anya-e1202n0:20_5: pūretvā paramābhisambodhiṁ patvā dhammacakkappavattanato paṭṭhāya yāva suhadda paribbājaka
anya-e1202n0:20_6: vinayāna sabba buddhakiccāni niṭṭhāpetvā anupādiyesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto
anya-e1202n0:20_7: tassa bhagavato arahato sammā sambuddhassa dhātuyo patiṭṭhāpetvā kato ayamettha saṅkhepo,
anya-e1202n0:21_0: 2. Ito kira kappasatasahassādhikānaṁ catunnaṁ asaṅkheyyānaṁ matthake amaravatī nāma
anya-e1202n0:21_1: nagaraṁ ahosi. Tattha sumedho nāma brāhmaṇo paṭivasati. So aññaṁ kammaṁ akatvā brahmaṇasippameva
anya-e1202n0:21_2: uggaṇhi tassa daharakāleyeva mātāpitaro kālamakaṁsu. Athassa rāsivaḍḍhanako amacco
anya-e1202n0:21_3: āya potthakaṁ āharitvā suvaṇṇa rajata maṇimuttādi bharite gabbhe vivaritvā ettakaṁ
anya-e1202n0:21_4: te kumāra mātu santakaṁ, ettakaṁ pitusantakaṁ, ettakaṁ ayyaka payyakānanti yāva sattamā
anya-e1202n0:21_5: kulaparivaṭṭā dhakaṁ ācikkhitvā etampaṭijaggāhīti āha. So sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā
anya-e1202n0:22_0: 3. Punabbhave paṭisaṇdhigahaṇaṁ tāma dukkhaṁ, tathā nibbatta nibbattaṭṭhāne sarīrabhedanaṁ
anya-e1202n0:22_1: ahañca jānidhammo jarādhammo vyādhidhammo maraṇadhammo. Evaṁ bhūtena mayā ajāti ajaraṁ
anya-e1202n0:22_2: avyādhiṁ amaraṇaṁ sukhaṁ sītalaṁ nibbānaṁ gavesituṁ vaṭṭatīti nekkhammakāraṇaṁ cintetvā
anya-e1202n0:22_3: puna cintesi imaṁ dhanaṁ sabbaṁ mayhaṁ pitu pitāmahādayo paralokaṁ gacchantā eka
anya-e1202n0:22_4: kahāpaṇampi gahetvā nagatā mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭatīti nagare
anya-e1202n0:22_5: bheriṁ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṁ datvā himavantassa pavisitvā tāpasa pabbajjaṁ
anya-e1202n0:22_6: pabbajitvā sattāhabbhantareyeva abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetva samāpattisukhena vītināmesi.
anya-e1202n0:23_0: Tadā dīpaṅkaro nāma satthā parayābhisambodhiṁ patvā satta sattāhaṁ bodhisamīpeceva
anya-e1202n0:23_1: vitināmetvā sunaṇdārāme dhammacakkaṁ pavattetvā koṭisattānaṁ devamanussānaṁ dhammamataṁ
anya-e1202n0:23_2: pāyetvā cātuddīpika mahāmegho viya dhammavassaṁ vassento catūhi khīṇāsaya satasahassehi
anya-e1202n0:23_3: parivuto anupubbena cārakaṁ caramāno ramma nagaraṁ patvā sudassana mahāvihāre paṭivasati
anya-e1202n0:23_4: tadā rammanagaravāsino sappi phaṇitādīni bhesajjāni gahetvā puppha dhūpa gaṇdhahatthā
anya-e1202n0:23_5: yena buddho tenapasaṅkamitvā satthāraṁ vaṇditvā pupphādīhi pūjetvā ekamantaṁ nisīditvā
anya-e1202n0:23_6: dhammaṁ sutvā svātanāya bhagavantaṁ nimantetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā dasabalaṁ padakkhīnaṁ katvā pakkamiṁsu.
anya-e1202n0:24_0: Te puna divase asadisa mahādānaṁ sajjetvā dasabalassa āgamana maggaṁ sodhenti. Tasmiṁ
anya-e1202n0:24_1: kāle sumedhatāpaso attano assama padato uggantvā rammanagaravāsīnaṁ tesaṁ manussānaṁ
anya-e1202n0:24_2: uparibhāgena ākāsena gacchantā te haṭṭhapahaṭṭhe maggaṁ sodhente disvā kinnu kho
anya-e1202n0:24_3: kāraṇanti cintento sabbesaṁ passantānaṁyeva ākāsato oru ekamante ṭhatthāyaha te manusse
anya-e1202n0:24_4: pucchi.’Hambho kassa pana imaṁ maggaṁ sodhethā’ti te āhaṁsu bhante sumedha tumhe
anya-e1202n0:24_5: kiṁ naṁ jānātha, dīpaṅkaro nāma satthā paramābhisambodhiṁ patvā pavattavara dhammacakko
anya-e1202n0:24_6: janapada cārikaṁ caramāno anukkamena amhākaṁ nagaraṁ patvā sudassana mahāvihāre paṭivasati.
anya-e1202n0:24_7: Mayaṁ taṁ bhagavantaṁ nimantayimha tassa bhagavato āgamanamaggaṁ sodhemāti. Taṁ sutvā
anya-e1202n0:24_8: sumedhapaṇḍito cintesi. Buddhoti kho panesa ghosopi dullabho, pageva buddhuppādo
anya-e1202n0:24_9: tena hi mayāpi imehi manussehi saddhiṁ dasabalassa āgamanamaggaṁ sodhetuṁ vaṭṭatīti
anya-e1202n0:24_10: so te manusse āha, sace bho tumhe imaṁ magga buddhassa sodhetha - sayahampi ekaṁ
anya-e1202n0:24_11: okāsaṁ sampaṭicchatvā ayaṁ sumedhapaṇḍito mahiddhiko mahānubhāvoti jānantā dubbisodhanaṁ
anya-e1202n0:24_12: udakasambhinnaṁ ativisamaṁ ekaṁ okāsaṁ sallakkhetvā imaṁ hakāsaṁ tumhe sodhetha.
anya-e1202n0:25_0: Sumedhapaṇḍito buddhārammaṇa pītiṁ uppādetvā cintesi. Ahampanimaṁ okāsaṁ iddhīyā
anya-e1202n0:25_1: paramadassanīya kātuṁ pahomi evaṁ kato pana maṁ na paritoseti ajja pana mayā kāyaveyyāvaccaṁ
anya-e1202n0:25_2: kātuṁ vaṭṭatiti paṁsuṁ āharitvā taṁ pahesaṁ pūreni, tassa pana tasmiṁ padese asodhite
anya-e1202n0:25_3: jayasumana kusuma sadisi vaṇṇaṁ dupaṭṭacīvaraṁ timaṇḍalaṁ paṭicchādetvā nivāsetvā
anya-e1202n0:25_4: tassupari yuṇṇamāpaṅgena kusumakalāpaṁ parakkhipanto viya vijjullatā sassīrīkaṁ kāyabaṇdhanaṁ
anya-e1202n0:25_5: baṇdhitvā kanaka girisikhara matthake lākhārasaṁ parisiñcante viya suvaṇṇacetiyaṁ
anya-e1202n0:25_6: pavāḷajālena parikkhipanto viya suvaṇṇaṅghakaṁ rattakambalena paṭimuñcanto viya sarada
anya-e1202n0:25_7: samaya rajanikaraṁ rattavalāhakena paṭicchādento viya ca lākhārasena tinna kiṁ sukaksumavaṇṇaṁ
anya-e1202n0:25_8: rattavara pasukūla cīvaraṁ pāripitvā gaṇdhakūgidva rato kanakaguhāto sīho viya nikkhamitvā
anya-e1202n0:25_9: jaḷabhiññānaṁyeva catūhi khīṇāsava satasahassehi parivuto amaragaṇa parivuto dasasatanayano
anya-e1202n0:25_10: viya brahmagaṇaparivuto mahā brahmā viya ca aparimita samaya samupacitāya kusalabalajanitāya
anya-e1202n0:25_11: anopamayā buddhalīlāya tārāgaṇaparivuto sarada samaya rajanikaro viya gaganatalaṁ
anya-e1202n0:26_0: 5. Sumedhatāpasopi tena alaṅkata paṭiyattena maggena āgacchantassa dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato
anya-e1202n0:26_1: dvattiṁsa varalakkhaṇa patimaṇḍitaṁ asatiyā anubyañjanehi anubyañjitaṁ byāmappahāparikkhepa
anya-e1202n0:26_2: sassīrīkaṁ iṇdanīlamaṇisaṁkāsoākāse nānappakārā vijjullatā viya chabbaṇṇabuddharaṁsiyo
anya-e1202n0:26_3: vissajjentaṁ rūpaggappattaṁ attabhāvaṁ oloketvā ajja mayā dasabalassa jīvitapariccāgaṁ
anya-e1202n0:26_4: kātuṁ vaṭṭati mā bhagavā kalale akkami maṇimayaṁ lakasetuṁ akkamanto viya saddhiṁ
anya-e1202n0:26_5: catūhi khīṇāsava satasahassehi mama piṭṭhiṁ akkamanto gacchatu taṁ me bhavissati
anya-e1202n0:26_6: dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyāti kese mocetvā ajinajaṭā vākacīrāni kalela pattharitvā
anya-e1202n0:26_7: tattheva kalalapiṭṭhe nipajji nipanno ca sace ahaṁ iccheyyaṁ sabbakilese jhāpetvā
anya-e1202n0:26_8: saṅghanavako hutvā rammanagaraṁ paviseyyaṁ aññātakavesena pana me kilese ṇdhapetvā
anya-e1202n0:26_9: nibbānapattiyā kiccaṁ natthi, yaṁnūnāhaṁ dīpaṅkara dasabalo viya paramābhisambodhiṁ
anya-e1202n0:26_10: patvā dhammanāvaṁ āropetvā mahājanaṁ saṁsārasāgarā uttāretvā pacchā parinibbāyeyyaṁ.
anya-e1202n0:26_11: Idaṁ me patirupanti cintetvā aṭṭhadhamme samodhānetvā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhāraṁ katvā nipajja.
anya-e1202n0:27_0: Dīpaṅkaropi bhagavā āgattvā sumedhapaṇḍitassa sīsasāge ṭhatvā kalalapiṭṭhe nipannaṁ
anya-e1202n0:27_1: tāpasaṁ disvā ayaṁ tāpaso buddhatthāya abhinīhāraṁ katvā nipanto, ijjhissati nu kho
anya-e1202n0:27_2: etassa patthanā udāhu noti upadhārento - anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatīti
anya-e1202n0:27_3: ñatvā ṭhitakova parisa majjhe vyākāsi, passatha no tumhe bhikkhave imaṁ uggatapaṁ
anya-e1202n0:27_4: tāpasaṁ kalalapiṭṭhe nipannanti. Evaṁ bhante, ayaṁ yiddhatthāya abhinīhāraṁ katvā
anya-e1202n0:27_5: nipanno samijjhissati imassa patthatā kappasata sahassādhikānaṁ catuntaṁ asaṅkheyyānaṁ
anya-e1202n0:27_6: matthake gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatīti sabbaṁ vyākāsi.
anya-e1202n0:31_0: Passatha imaṁ tāpasaṁ - jaṭila uggatāpasaṁ aparimeyye ito kappe - ayaṁ buddho bhavissati.
anya-e1202n0:31_1: Ahu kapilavahayā rammā - nikkhamitvā tathāgato. Padhānaṁ padahitvāna - katvā dukkara kārikaṁ
anya-e1202n0:39: Imassajanikā mātā - māyā nāma bhavissati, pitā suddhodano nāma - ayaṁ hessati gotamo. Anāsavā vītarāgā - santacittā samāhitā,
anya-e1202n0:40: Kolito upatisso ca - aggā hessanti sāvakā;
anya-e1202n0:42: Khemā uppalavaṇṇā ca - aggā hessanti sāvikā;
